name: Myst Maze
description:
Welcome to Myst Maze!
A unique puzzle game experience for 2 or 4 players.

Compete in a race to the center of a mysterios maze by building barriers blocking your friends while coming up with the perfect path for your light to get into the goal.
A perfect local multiplayer for hanging out with a single controller on the couch on a chill evening with friends.

This game has been originally developed as a student project created at the University of Applied Sciences Upper Austria, Campus Hagenberg during the Digital Arts master's program:
